definitions.definition: So as to form a flat surface.
examples: Spread the icing evenly over the cake.

definitions.definition: In a fair manner of distribution, giving the same amount or number to each; equally .
examples: To avoid arguments, he divided the sweets evenly between his two children.

definitions.definition: In a manner that leaves no remainder .
In terms of or by means of even numbers.

main_definition: So as to form a flat surface.
secondary_definitions: In a fair manner of distribution, giving the same amount or number to each; equally .
( mathematics ) In a manner that leaves no remainder .
In terms of or by means of even numbers.
